title: LeaverBuster for something i couldn't fx
body: i just got a afk/ leaver buster onto my account because i had to restart my pc, then after i did that i was forced to re update my client (which i just did) and once that was done i couldnt click the reconnect button. how is this fair? because now i have to wait 20 mins just for a game (5 games) this is wrong and im getting sick of this buggy game

replies.body: Riot doesn't revert leaver buster bans/queue timers, also, you don't get queue timers for afking once, so you shouldn't have afk'd before hand.
